dcterms:description: 12Scenes is a dataset containing 12 indoor scenes, each with several hundreds of frames, used for evaluating visual localization methods. RGB images are registered to depth maps.
dcterms:title: 12Scenes

dcterms:creator: Jamie Shotton
Ben Glocker
Christopher Zach
Shahram Izadi
Antonio Criminisi
Andrew Fitzgibbon
dcterms:description: 7Scenes is a dataset consisting of several thousands of frames from multiple indoor scenes, used for camera relocalization in RGB-D images. The dataset includes depth images scanned by a structured light sensor.
dcterms:title: 7Scenes

dcterms:creator: Alex Kendall
Matthew Grimes
Roberto Cipolla
dcterms:description: Cambridge Landmarks is a dataset for evaluating localization algorithms in large-scale outdoor scenes, featuring varying illumination and exposure conditions.
dcterms:title: Cambridge Landmarks

dcterms:creator: Jiaming Sun
Zihao Wang
Siyu Zhang
Xingyi He
Hongcheng Zhao
Guofeng Zhang
Xiaowei Zhou
dcterms:description: Onepose is an object-level pose estimation dataset collected using hand-held smartphones, featuring videos captured around object instances with different backgrounds.
dcterms:title: Onepose
